post4.caption: I always have fun doing this 😂😂😂 @harrystyles

post6.caption: I don't think I've ever shared but.. our love story was a story that was rather lonely. The whole world was against us, but we didn't let anything and anyone define us. We were in love, we gave love to others even when we didn't receive any love in return, and we carried on with love and only love. Sometimes, you just need to believe in your heart and your heart only, because who knows you better than anything else. We chose each other after everything and we still do. I love you. It was all worth it. 💖

post8.caption: Tadaaa! ✨ Turned hubby's blazer (that he no longer wears) into a tote bag for moi, also featuring Daria's broken sunglasses 😄🥰💖🌏♻️ #upcycling #DRsewing #sustainablefashion #imademyclothes

#comoSL #iamspecialized

post6.caption:
Happy Independence Day, Indonesiaaaaaa! 🇮🇩 Seneng banget hari ini bisa 17 Agustusan lagi. Karena kami tinggal di Swiss dan lagi nggak bisa ikut ngerayain bareng temen-temen Indonesia lainnya di KBRI, jadinya kita masak aja dehhhh di rumah. Hari ini kita masak salah satu masakan legendaris Indonesia yang mendunia yaitu... tempe orek! #tempeislife 😛 Gampang, super enak, dan pastinya kunci enak masaknya yaa #KecapinBango 💚 Kalian masak apa hari iniiii?

Jangan lupa cek berbagai #ResepKulinerLegendaris ala Festival Jajanan Bango di website bango ya! 😊 www.bango.co.id/reseplegendaris

post8.caption:
IT'S TODAAYYYYYY! 👋🏻

Shop my upcycled clothes along with these new shopper tote bags I made from secondhand t-shirts and profits from this day will go directly to the building of wells and access to clean water in Sumba, Indonesia. 🇮🇩

This event is a charity collaboration project between @waiyka, @fairfuturefoundation, me and other Lausanne-based creators.

📍Avenue du Tribunal-Fédéral 5, 1005 Lausanne

#upcycling #charity #DRcollabs #DRsewing

post9.caption: Just finished making tote bags out of old secondhand t-shirts for an upcoming charity project. Woohoo! 💖 #upcycling #sustainablefashion #DRcollabs #DRsewing

post11.caption: After making a poll to decide which place in Switzerland we should vlog about next, you guys chose Château de Chillon so the castle it issssss! Enjoyyy! 🥰💖✨ @myswitzerland  #DRxSwitzerlandTourism #INeedSwitzerland #inLOVEwithSWITZERLAND
